public class LaTeX

(source file: LaTeX.java)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Printer
           |
           +----LaTeX
The pure class interface. 
public class LaTeX
  extends Printer
A printer which uses LaTeX control sequences to control the formatting (useful for pretty-printing programs).

Author:
Alan Jeffrey
Version: v1.0 1998/06/11
